icebreakers.prompt: Tony, I've noticed you're contributing to AI development at crewAI. What exciting projects are currently underway at the company that you're particularly passionate about?
Your educational journey included coursework in Data Structures and Algorithms at the University of Pennsylvania. How do you feel this background has influenced your work in AI?
Given your active engagement in AI and technology content on LinkedIn, how do you see the role of AI agents evolving in the next few years?
As an author of an article about resilience, how do you think the concept of resilience applies to the fast-paced developments in AI technology?
As a former NCAA Division I and II student-athlete, how has your experience in athletics influenced your professional career and approach to challenges?
